ygData.subject: Re: New paper on Evolution Rivaling Backprop
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Dave, Thanks for your thoughts.  Indeed we also think it can open up a lot of interesting opportunities.  MNIST is a natural place to try it, but the reason
